title: 怎么给官服服务端装FORGE啊
author: LYYANAN
txt_content:
怎么给这货装FORGE啊




QQ截图20121103234009.png (68.3 KB, 下载次数: 26)

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content:
LYYANAN 发表于 2012-11-4 15:06 
winrar...
我就不信你的家伙那么坑爹
下载这个https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... inecraft_server.jar
然后下载Forge:http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... ersal-6.0.1.341.zip
然后用winrar打开minecraft_server.jar,把Forge放进去

replies.author: skykun
replies.txt_content:
噗，你被Mojong坑了
把minecraft_server.exe换成minecraft_server.jar来运行吧

安装Forge时用7-zip或者其他的软件打开直接放到jar包里就可以了

replies.txt_content: 一定要jar版本哦，嘻嘻
